item.title: Call for Blog Posts
item.description: R-Ladies Chicago is excited to start this blog to showcase the perspectives of different members in the R-Ladies Chicago community! We are looking for individuals who are interested in contributing to this blog. Whether you just want to write a single blog post or contribute regularly, we want to hear from you! Weâ€™re hoping to have two new posts each month on this blog. Blog posts could consist of: Event Recaps (either an R-Ladies Meetup or Study Group Meeting or another R-related event)
